prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a red hat and a blue body, emphasizing its sturdy nature.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a mountain with a red scarf, perfect for rugged terrains.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that has a large nose and a blue, square-shaped body.

Give me a Pokemon that looks like a rocky statue, wearing a stylish red accessory.
